ovdesc.p: Batch group is a file containing a list of batch groups for telex messages. Each batch group contains a number of message types which will be assigned to the batch group if the message is suitable for batching.
A message type may not exist in more than one batch group.

desc.p: Choose a meaningful number to describe the batch group.
Describes the batch group specified by this batch group record.
Description may be entered in each of the languages defined in the LANGUAGE table.
3-35 type A(alphanumeric) characters. Multilanguage field. (Mandatory input.)
Defines the message type to be batched into the batch group specified in this record.
Message type must exist on only one batch group record.
The message type entered must exist on the DE.MESSAGE table.
